techniques.name: Violent Checkers Lo-Res
techniques.description: Physics-based checkers game in lo-res mode with billiards-style piece launching
steps: Initialize piece arrays for 24 pieces (12 per team)
Draw green field with yellow border
Pull back from piece to set direction/power
Physics loop with wall bounce and friction

techniques.name: Violent Checkers HGR
techniques.description: Physics-based billiards-style checkers game using Apple II HGR (280x192) graphics with two teams, collision detection, damage system, and slingshot-style aiming.
steps: 1. Initialize arrays: PX(), PY() for positions, PH() for health (3 HP), PT() for team
2. Place 12 pieces per team in 4x3 grid formation
3. HGR mode with white border rectangle
6. IJKL movement controls, SPACE to select/fire
7. Slingshot aiming: pull cursor away from piece, direction determines launch vector
9. Collision: distance check, deal 1 damage, bounce off
10. Turn-based: switch teams after piece stops moving
techniques.notes: Controls: I=up, K=down, J=left, L=right, SPACE=select piece then fire. Pull cursor away from selected piece like a slingshot - piece launches in opposite direction.
